name: Chicken Chase (itch) (pastelcakeyy)
description:
This is a fast pack platformer collect all 6 chickens in the time limit

Controls: 

A,D to move

Space to jump

R to reset the game

1,2,3,4 checkpoints

made by using 8x8 paper pixels

Download the asset a pack: https://v3x3d.itch.io/paper-pixels

Developer = Pastel(me)

play tester = SaddrDays
